title: Create Notification List Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying a list of notifications with filtering, sorting, and pagination capabilities

user_stories: As a user, I want to receive notifications about my bookings so that I'm informed of changes
As a user, I want to view my notifications so that I can stay updated
business_rules: Notification list must display notifications with read/unread status
Notification list must support filtering by status and sorting
Notification list must follow the design system
Notification list must handle loading states and error messages
edge_cases: Handling empty notification lists and loading states
Managing large notification lists with pagination
Processing filter and sort operations efficiently
Displaying notifications with proper read/unread indicators

acceptance_criteria: Notification list component displays notifications with pagination and filtering
Notification list component supports sorting by different fields
Notification list component follows the design system
Notification list component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Notification list component integrates with Notification Management API endpoints

endpoints.description: Get all notifications with optional filtering and pagination

integration_tests: Notification list integration with backend APIs
Filtering and sorting with API parameters

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement notification list component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with notification management API. Implement efficient filtering and sorting.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for notification list access. Implement appropriate privacy controls for notification information display.
